introduction: SYNOPSISJung-hwa lives with Jin-shik and Yeon-ji. Yeon-ji gets pregnant. The married Jung-hwa sleeps with Chi-bal and is thrown out. Yeon-ji has her baby and she tells Ae-koo, the forest ranger, that the father is Jin-shik. Ae-koo tells this to Im Jin-sa and the couple is therefore punished. Yeon-ji gets her head shaven and Jin-shik is punished by being wrapped in a straw rug and then beaten. Jung-hwa and Keok-sae, returning from a trip, set Im Jin-sa straight about the past and therefore Yeon-ji and Jin-shik are released from jail. Ae-koo forces himself on Jung-hwa and then tries to live with her but Jung-hwa kills him instead. Holding Chi-bal's mask, Jung-hwa sets her room on fire.故事净化生活与陈式和胭脂。洁净他的胭脂已婚，有一个家庭，有了孩子，和过早死亡已经排出seokge的namsadangpae chwibalyi和身体。胭脂孔陈式艾拉的孩子供认sanjigi - 独眼男子说的是壬辰四 - 独眼人。所以胭脂是kkakyigo头部被击中陈式就是meongseok卷曲。纯化和抽筋是小市集一趟回来，告诉在过去的四年临津的故事。陈式和胭脂释放和一个 - 独眼人被强奸，但作为一种清洁和净化saljago杀一个 - 独眼男子拿着一个chwibalyi乘坐穿越在房间里的火。然而，陈式和清洗正在寻求欣慰地看到一个孩子谁，抽筋。然而，伤口清洗眼睛。
